summary: The sole survivor of an interplanetary rescue mission searches for the only survivor of the previous expedition. He discovers a planet ruled by apes and an underground city run by telepathic humans.
cast: James Franciscus|Kim Hunter|Maurice Evans|Linda Harrison|Paul Richards|Victor Buono|James Gregory|Jeff Corey|Natalie Trundy|Thomas Gomez|Don Pedro Colley|David Watson|Tod Andrews|Eldon Burke|Gregory Sierra|Charlton Heston|Lou Wagner|Army Archerd|Edward Bach|James Bacon|Stan Barrett|Angelina Bauer|Erlynn Mary Botelho|Maxine Botelho|Dick Bullock|Bruce Fleischer|Paul Frees|Roddy McDowall|Hank Robinson
title: Regreso al planeta de los simios
